text: SELECT Student.id, AVG(Enrollment.exam_mark) as “avg_exam_mark’, AVG(Enrollment.practical_mark) as ‘avg_practical_mark’ FROM Student, Enrollment WHERE Enrollment.student_id = Student.id GROUP BY Student.id Sl < id . avg exam_mark ‘avg_practical_mark 2 1235000 57.0000 11.0000 3 1236000 81.0000 16.0000 4 1237000 47.0000 10.0000 5 1238000 47.0000 10.0000
